DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Trial Assess Impact Acupuncture Post-mastectomy Pain , Nausea , Anxiety Ability Cope
DOC.detailed_description: About 40 subject participate study . Following qualification study , participant randomly assign chance receive either acupuncture receive standard care without integrative medicine session . - One group receive acupuncture surgery . Acupuncture involve insert thin , sterile needle certain point body . - The group receive standard care without acupuncture session . Before surgery participant complete demographic questionnaire . After surgery , participant visit hospital room either acupuncturist another member research team . For assigned acupuncture group , participant receive two session acupuncture , least twelve hour apart . For assigned control group , research team member visit participant room two time , least twelve hour apart . During visit , participant ask pain , nausea , anxiety , ability cope begin end treatment visit . Additional information gather participant hospital chart , type surgery perform , length hospital stay , cost associate hospital stay .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old Undergoing mastectomy surgery NonEnglish speaking Pregnant Also undergo oophorectomy , TRAM Latissimus flap surgery
